Text:
TO DOWNLOAD THIS GAME GOTO THE ACTUAL SITE https://signup.leagueoflegends.com/en/signup/index

http://na.leagueoflegends.com/

Those are the original sites that will download a CLEAN version and not use a fake URL to sign up
This is the official client and the link is also on the official website. Just when you insert a link in the description, its automatically removed, had to make a shorter link.
Try to follow this link, you will be redirected to official website.
